rishikesh.shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • rishikesh.shapes.Shape
      • rishikesh.shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape
    This class represents a Circle modeled for processing.js
    Version:
    9.20.2017
    Author:
    rdevanathan686

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class rishikesh.shapes.Shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle()
      Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions (x, y, radius) set to zero.
      Circle(double x, double y, double radius)
      Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the center point being x and y and the radius set to the parameter radius

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions (x, y, radius) set to zero.

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the center point being x and y and the radius set to the parameter radius
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the center coordinate
        y - the y-coordinate of the center coordinate
        radius - the radius of the Circle

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws the Circle object with the center point being x and y and the radius set to the parameter radius
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the canvas to draw the objects on
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its ellipse mode modified to PApplet.RADIUS
